name.th: ตัวนำเข้าขั้นสูง

short.ar: من خلال امتداد المستورد المتقدم هذا, يمكنك استيراد أي شيء (أي بيانات تريدها) من أي موقع ويب بنقرة واحدة فقط.
short.am,bn,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,: Through this Advanced Importer extension you can import anything (any data you want) from any website in just one click.
short.bg: Чрез това разширение Advanced Importer можете да импортирате всичко (всякакви данни, които искате) от всеки уебсайт само с едно…
short.ca: A través d'aquesta extensió Advanced Importer podeu importar qualsevol cosa (qualsevol dada que vulgueu) des de qualsevol lloc web…
short.cs: Prostřednictvím tohoto rozšíření Advanced Importer můžete importovat cokoli (jakákoli data, která chcete) z libovolného webu…
short.da: Gennem denne Advanced Importer-udvidelse kan du importere hvad som helst (enhver data, du ønsker) fra ethvert websted med blot ét…
short.el: Μέσω αυτής της επέκτασης Advanced Importer μπορείτε να εισάγετε οτιδήποτε (όποια δεδομένα θέλετε) από οποιονδήποτε ιστότοπο με ένα…
short.es: A través de esta extensión de importación avanzada, puedes importar cualquier cosa (cualquier dato que desees) desde cualquier…
short.fi: Tämän Advanced Importer -laajennuksen avulla voit tuoda mitä tahansa (kaikki haluamasi tiedot) mistä tahansa verkkosivustosta…
short.fr: Grâce à cette extension Advanced Importer, vous pouvez importer n'importe quoi (toutes les données que vous voulez) depuis…
short.hi: इस उन्नत आयातक एक्सटेंशन के माध्यम से आप किसी भी वेबसाइट से केवल एक क्लिक में कुछ भी (कोई भी डेटा जो आप चाहते हैं) आयात कर सकते हैं।
short.hr: Kroz ovo proširenje Advanced Importer možete uvesti bilo što (bilo koje podatke koje želite) s bilo koje web stranice u samo jednom…
short.hu: Ezen az Advanced Importer bővítményen keresztül egyetlen kattintással bármit (bármilyen adatot) importálhat bármely webhelyről.
short.id: Melalui ekstensi Importir Lanjutan ini, Anda dapat mengimpor apa pun (data apa pun yang Anda inginkan) dari situs web mana pun…
short.it: Attraverso questa estensione Advanced Importer puoi importare qualsiasi cosa (tutti i dati che desideri) da qualsiasi sito Web con…
short.ja: この Advanced Importer 拡張機能を使用すると,ワンクリックで任意の Web サイトから何でも (任意のデータを) インポートできます。
short.ko: 이 고급 가져오기 확장 프로그램을 통해 클릭 한 번으로 모든 웹사이트에서 원하는 모든 데이터를 가져올 수 있습니다.
short.lt: Naudodami šį išplėstinio importuotojo plėtinį galite importuoti bet ką (bet kokius norimus duomenis) iš bet kurios svetainės vienu…
short.nl: Via deze Advanced Importer-extensie kunt u met slechts één klik alles (alle gegevens die u wilt) van elke website importeren.
short.no: Gjennom denne Advanced Importer-utvidelsen kan du importere hva som helst (hvilke data du vil) fra hvilken som helst nettside med…
short.pl: Dzięki temu rozszerzeniu Advanced Importer możesz zaimportować wszystko (dowolne dane) z dowolnej witryny za pomocą jednego…
short.ro: Prin această extensie Advanced Importer puteți importa orice (orice date doriți) de pe orice site web cu un singur clic.
short.ru: С помощью этого расширения Advanced Importer вы можете импортировать что угодно (любые данные) с любого веб-сайта всего в один клик.
short.sv: Genom detta tillägg för Advanced Importer kan du importera vad som helst (vilken data du vill) från vilken webbplats som helst med…
short.th: ด้วยส่วนขยายตัวนำเข้าขั้นสูงนี้ คุณสามารถนำเข้าอะไรก็ได้ (ข้อมูลใดๆ ที่คุณต้องการ) จากเว็บไซต์ใดก็ได้ในคลิกเดียว
short.tr: Bu Gelişmiş İçe Aktarıcı uzantısı ile herhangi bir web sitesinden herhangi bir şeyi (istediğiniz herhangi bir veriyi) tek bir…
short.uk: За допомогою цього розширення Advanced Importer ви можете імпортувати будь-що (будь-які дані, які забажаєте) з будь-якого веб-сайту…
short.vi: Thông qua tiện ích mở rộng Trình nhập nâng cao này, bạn có thể nhập bất kỳ thứ gì (bất kỳ dữ liệu nào bạn muốn) từ bất kỳ trang web…

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,hi,hr,hu,i:
Through this Advanced Importer extension you can import anything (any data you want) from any website in just one click. This single extension can work perfectly on all websites. You will need an auxiliary module to make this extension work and to filter the data according to your requirement. You'll feel the experience like never before.

There are plenty of ready to use modules / extensions available for Amazon, Aliexpress, eBay and Walmart.

Buy PrestaShop Product Importer modules: https://addons.prestashop.com/en/2_community-developer?contributor=1126640

Buy WooCommerce Product Importer modules: https://woocommerce.com/vendor/nxtal/

Buy OpenCart Product Importer modules: https://www.opencart.com/index.php?route=marketplace/extension&filter_search=nxtal

Buy Magento Product Importer modules: Contact us at contact@nxtal.com

You can contact us at contact@nxtal.com for any other module requirements.
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fa,:
####### IMPORTANT ######## IMPORTANT ######## IMPORTANT #######

Dear Valued Customers,

We want to bring to your attention the unfortunate occurrence of fraudulent sales of our plugin from unauthorized sources. It has come to our notice that several websites are illegally selling our plugin at significantly lower prices. We want to emphasize that these unauthorized sellers are not affiliated with us in any way.

To ensure that you receive genuine products with the best quality and support, we urge you to purchase our plugin only from official open-source marketplaces like WooCommerce, PrestaShop, OpenCart. These platforms guarantee authenticity and provide the necessary support to ensure a smooth experience for our customers.

Your trust and satisfaction are of utmost importance to us, and we are committed to providing you with top-notch products and support. Thank you for your understanding and continued support.

####### IMPORTANT ######## IMPORTANT ######## IMPORTANT #######


Upgrade your ecommerce website catalog management system experience with our Chrome extension! Effortlessly import products and data from over 100 popular marketplace websites, including Amazon, eBay, Shein, Aliexpress, and Walmart etc. Say goodbye to manual Product Creation/data entry and streamline your website product management process. Get started today!

Through this Advanced Importer extension, you can import anything (any data you want) from any website in just one click. This single extension can work perfectly on all websites. You will need an auxiliary module to make this extension work and to filter the data according to your requirement. You'll feel the experience like never before.

There are plenty of ready to use modules / extensions available for Amazon, Aliexpress, eBay and Walmart.

Buy PrestaShop Product Importer modules: https://addons.prestashop.com/en/2_community-developer?contributor=1126640

Buy WooCommerce Product Importer modules: https://woocommerce.com/vendor/nxtal/

Buy OpenCart Product Importer modules: https://www.opencart.com/index.php?route=marketplace/extension&filter_search=nxtal


You can contact us at contact@nxtal.com for any other module requirements.
